picture_attchment.path FROM dic_process_mode AS dic_process_mode LEFT JOIN picture_attchment AS picture_attchment ON dic_process_mode.id = picture_attchment.parent_id and picture_attchment.type = #{type} WHERE (dic_process_mode.company_id = 0 or dic_process_mode.company_id = #{companyId})
